body_html:
@luizgh @andrewgiessel I'm new to keras. It seems the spp pooling layer and RoI pooling layer in that keras implementation just support forward operation. Can it be used to train a new network via back propagation?
I have seen some other code adding a new layer by implementing forward and backward separately (with cpu and gpu version). But I am searching for a easier way to implement a custom pooling layer.

body:
@luizgh @andrewgiessel I'm new to keras. It seems the spp pooling layer and RoI pooling layer in that keras implementation just support forward operation. Can it be used to train a new network via back propagation? 
I have seen some other code adding a new layer by implementing forward and backward separately (with cpu and gpu version). But I am searching for a easier way to implement a custom pooling layer.
